originalText.text: Found this great company on Etsy. Transaction was very easy. Mary Grace was very responsive and helpful the whole process. Delivery was quick and flawless.

text.text: Found this great company on Etsy. Transaction was very easy. Mary Grace was very responsive and helpful the whole process. Delivery was quick and flawless.

originalText.text: Stephen and his wife Mary Grace (on Etsy and in the same storefront)  are absolutely wonderful people and have the most beautiful antique jewelry at great prices.  They are both patient and explained the different cuts in antique stones and gave us plenty of time to select the ring.  We couldn't be happier with it and have been repeat customers. Very much worth a visit.

text.text: Stephen and his wife Mary Grace (on Etsy and in the same storefront)  are absolutely wonderful people and have the most beautiful antique jewelry at great prices.  They are both patient and explained the different cuts in antique stones and gave us plenty of time to select the ring.  We couldn't be happier with it and have been repeat customers. Very much worth a visit.

originalText.text: My husband and I (and a former boyfriend) have bought wonderful jewelry from Stephen, really nice experiences. Honest and with good taste.

text.text: My husband and I (and a former boyfriend) have bought wonderful jewelry from Stephen, really nice experiences. Honest and with good taste.

originalText.text: Stephen and his wife are a rare find I'm the diamond district. Good people, fair prices, great products. My fiancé and I just bought my wedding band from them and couldn't be happier with it. Definitely go see!

text.text: Stephen and his wife are a rare find I'm the diamond district. Good people, fair prices, great products. My fiancé and I just bought my wedding band from them and couldn't be happier with it. Definitely go see!

originalText.text: I was interested in an item on their Etsy store.  I got a response that day,  and asked for additional photos of the piece.   Did not hear back so two days later I asked about the piece and the photos, and was told the item was out with a “dealer”  days go by and I send messages and she doesn’t respond for days.  Then I’m told it may not get back from the dealer for a month or so.  I have asked to purchase this piece several times, but they have “deals” with their dealers and it can not be purchased when it’s “out” with “dealers”.   I even asked to purchase it FROM their “dealer”.  I was trying to purchase a gift.  Here it is over a month later and I am finally told it was “SOLD”. I am so sad that I could not get the gift I was hoping for and that I was basically lead on and wasted my time.  I tried constantly to purchase.  Clearly didn’t want to sell to me. Don’t get hopes up.  Store lack response and customer service.  I stated I was interested several times, offered to send payment etc.  Nothing.   Very upset I wasted a whole month trying to purchase something they were going to sell to someone else anyway-  and probably already knew it.
